item.title: 判断点是否在图形内部
item.description: 判断一个点是否在矩形内部 题目: 在二维坐标系中，所有的值都是double类型那么一个矩形可以由4个点来代表:（x1,y1)为最左的点、（x2,

item.title: Fizz Buzz
item.description: 412. Fizz Buzz Write a program that outputs the string representation of numbers from 1 to n. But for multiples of three it should output “Fizz” instead of the number and for the multiples of five output “Buzz”. For numbers which are multiples of both three and five output “FizzBuzz”
